title: Sexual Purity Commandments Quiz - Biblical Commands About Sexual Purity
description: Test your knowledge of the 24 biblical commandments related to sexual purity. Covers 0 positive and 24 negative commandments from the Torah.

questions.question: Which of the following is forbidden according to Leviticus 18:7?
options: Having sexual relations with your mother
Having sexual relations with your sister
Having sexual relations with your brother's wife
Having sexual relations with your son's wife
questions.correctAnswer: Having sexual relations with your mother
questions.explanation: Commandment #139 prohibits having sexual relations with your mother, as stated in Leviticus 18:7.

questions.question: According to the commandments, is it allowed to have sexual relations with your father's wife's daughter?
questions.explanation: Commandment #142 forbids sexual relations with your father's wife's daughter because she is considered your sister (Leviticus 18:11).

questions.question: Which commandment forbids sexual relations with a woman and her daughter's daughter?
questions.explanation: Commandment #148 explicitly forbids relations with a woman and her daughter's daughter (Leviticus 18:17).

questions.question: What category do all these commandments belong to?
questions.explanation: All 24 commandments listed belong to the 'Forbidden Sexual Relationships' category.

questions.question: Is it permitted to have sexual relations with your brother's wife according to these commandments?
questions.explanation: Commandment #153 forbids sexual relations with your brother's wife, as it is considered your brother's nakedness (Leviticus 18:16).

questions.question: Which of the following verses forbids homosexual sexual relations?
questions.explanation: Commandment #157 forbids homosexual sexual relations specifically in Leviticus 18:22.

questions.question: Do any commandments in this category allow positive sexual relations?
questions.explanation: All 24 commandments in this category are negative prohibitions; none are positive commandments.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids sexual relations with a menstrually impure woman?
questions.explanation: Commandment #161 forbids approaching a woman during her menstrual impurity (Leviticus 18:19).

questions.question: Fill in the blank: According to Leviticus 18:15, you shall not have sexual relations with your ______.
questions.explanation: Commandment #152 forbids sexual relations with your son's wife (Leviticus 18:15).

questions.question: Which commandment forbids sexual relations with a woman and her sonâ€™s daughter?
questions.explanation: Commandment #147 forbids sexual relations with a woman and her son's daughter (Leviticus 18:17).

questions.question: According to these commandments, what is the relationship between sexual relations with your father's sister?
options: Forbidden because she is your father's blood relative
questions.correctAnswer: Forbidden because she is your father's blood relative
questions.explanation: Commandment #149 forbids sexual relations with your father's sister because she is your father's blood relative (Leviticus 18:12).

questions.question: Is it permitted to have sexual relations with an animal according to these commandments?
questions.explanation: Commandments #155 and #156 clearly forbid sexual relations with animals for both men and women (Leviticus 18:23).

questions.question: Which of these commandments forbids sexual relations with your daughter's daughter?
questions.explanation: Commandment #145 forbids sexual relations with your daughter's daughter (Leviticus 18:10).

questions.question: True or False: Leviticus 18:20 forbids sexual relations with someone else's wife.
questions.explanation: Commandment #160 forbids sexual relations with your neighbor's wife to prevent defilement (Leviticus 18:20).

questions.question: Which commandment forbids uncovering the nakedness of your father's brother's wife?
questions.explanation: Commandment #151 forbids sexual relations with your father's brother's wife, who is your aunt (Leviticus 18:14).

questions.question: Which commandment forbids marrying a woman in addition to her sister as a rival while she is alive?
questions.explanation: Commandment #154 forbids marrying a woman in addition to her sister as a rival while the first sister is alive (Leviticus 18:18).

questions.question: Fill in the blank: Leviticus 18:6 declares that none shall approach any blood relative of his to ______ nakedness.
questions.explanation: Commandment #144 declares that none shall approach any blood relative to uncover nakedness (Leviticus 18:6).

questions.question: Is uncovering the nakedness of your father's brother allowed according to these commandments?
questions.explanation: Commandment #159 forbids uncovering the nakedness of your father's brother (Leviticus 18:14).

questions.question: Which commandments explicitly forbid sexual relations with both men and women and animals?
questions.explanation: Commandments #155 and #156 forbid sexual relations with animals for both men and women (Leviticus 18:23).

questions.question: According to the commandments, is having sexual relations with your daughter's daughter considered forbidden?
questions.explanation: Commandment #145 forbids sexual relations with your daughter's daughter, as it is your nakedness (Leviticus 18:10).

questions.question: Which commandment warns against making pleasurable sexual contact with any forbidden woman?
questions.explanation: Commandment #175 forbids making pleasurable sexual contact with any forbidden woman (Leviticus 18:6).

questions.question: Is uncovering the nakedness of your father's wife considered uncovering your father's nakedness?
questions.explanation: Commandment #140 states that uncovering the nakedness of your father's wife is considered uncovering your father's nakedness (Leviticus 18:8).

questions.question: Which commandment forbids sexual relations with your mother's sister?
questions.explanation: Commandment #150 forbids sexual relations with your mother's sister as she is your mother's blood relative (Leviticus 18:13).
